socket_client module¶

class socket_client.SocketClient(host, port, response_handler)[source]¶

Bases: object

Client to communicate to custom socket server.

Based off of code from: https://github.com/realpython/materials/blob/master/python-sockets-tutorial/libclient.py https://realpython.com/python-sockets/

Class attributes:

close()[source]¶

Close the selector and socket.

read_response()[source]¶

Read the response from the socket.

send_request(request, encoding='utf-8')[source]¶

Create the request object, set the selector to write, and wait for the socket to be writable. Once writable, execute the message write.

Arguments: request (str): String to send to the socket server. encoding (optional - str): Encoding to use for request content.

socketserver
